duties_responsibilities.duty: Developing large, potentially long-term opportunities across the operation.
Identifying potential large opportunities outside of the current fiscal quarter.
Driving customer actions around consumption models and early deployment of new solutions.
Orchestrating and deploying the extended team to deliver vertical and/or architectural solutions.
Engaging as a player-coach with aligned account teams.
Leading account planning and orchestrating cross-functional resources for the success of the account.
Influencing LOB and CXO buying decisions by partnering with the local Regional team.
Identifying and positioning the best solution for customers.
